name: Castle of Immortals
description:
Enter the Castle of Immortals and slay the forces within!

Left Click to attack with your scythe.

Hold Right Click to charge a crossbow shot. Charging once will cause the bolt to stun its target. A fully charged bolt is the only way to kill an enemy, but it will only work when they are sufficiently weakened by your melee attacks.

Shift to roll. You cannot be damaged while rolling, and you can fire your crossbow while doing so.

How many Immortals will you take down?
